title: owncloud error
body:
hi.

i'm running the latest verion of owncloud on server 2008r2 running latest php and mysql.  my file versions don't seem to work.  i suspect it has to do with the following errors i'm getting in the logs:


warning

php

filesize(): stat failed for c:\inetpub\wwwroot\data/nhavenga/files-versions/s/clientsync/jellyfish-jpg.v1247549546 at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#95

may 6, 2013 22:34



warning

php

filesize(): stat failed for c:\inetpub\wwwroot\data/nhavenga/files-versions/s/clientsync/hydrangeas-jpg.v1247549546 at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#95

may 6, 2013 22:34



warning

php

filesize(): stat failed for c:\inetpub\wwwroot\data/nhavenga/files-versions/s/clientsync/desert-jpg.v1247549546 at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#95

may 6, 2013 22:34



warning

php

filesize(): stat failed for c:\inetpub\wwwroot\data/nhavenga/files-versions/s/clientsync/chrysanthemum-jpg.v1367869528 at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#95

may 6, 2013 22:34



warning

php

filesize(): stat failed for c:\inetpub\wwwroot\data/nhavenga/files-versions/s/clientsync/hydrangeas-jpg.v1247549546 at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#95

may 6, 2013 22:19



warning

php

filesize(): stat failed for c:\inetpub\wwwroot\data/nhavenga/files-versions/s/clientsync/desert-jpg.v1247549546 at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\lib\files\storage\mappedlocal.php#95

may 6, 2013 22:19


does it have to do with the backslash "\" data "/" forwardslash??

this doesn't seem right.  i did the installation step by step so i cannot understand this issue.

please assist if you can?
